attributes.action: this is not war..its about the creation and use of chemical weapons
attributes.additional_details:
Syria is at war yes...
No we should not get involved...I believe a country true peace and future lies init dealing with its own issues....over the history of time liberation comes from the people who create what they love..HOME.
That said we cannot allow cowards to create invisable death...the issues of the country are not there concern...loss of powerful is what they fear...in this country alone  there are 100s of thousands of people who are one generation away from KNOWING AND FEELING chemical deaths....anyone who would use, store, create or even research chem weapons can not be talked down...death is there goal...as we have seen in Syria it is one step further. ...kill the next generation if resistance....YES THE CHILDREN.
This is not a call to invade....NO..but we can instigate tactical technical strikes. If not then another dictator will hide what he is doing till its too late and 100S 1000s are gone forever. ..
